\caption{When $\kappa=\h$, the
choices $\omega_1=\h\pi/L_1$,
$\omega_2=0$ and
$\omega_1=\h\pi/L_1$,
$\omega_2=\h\pi/L_2$
yield constituent separations
allowing the torus to be cut (dashed line) to
yield charge $\h$ instantons.
}
